channel.title: [317] pvp help please [317]
channel.description:
How would i go about GURANTEED pvp drops, for example, if a player was killed he would drop all of his items INCLUDING an extra 1M in coins even if he did/did not have it in his inventory?
And is there any way to change what is being dropped depending on the person who is dead's combat level?
